text: The Sindhi topi is a traditional cap, it is the cultural symbol of Sindhi men, it is a skullcap with an arch-shape cut out in front of cap, embroidered with local Sindhi embroideries, mirrorwork, gemstone work etc, it is worn by Sindhi men in Sindh, but Sindhi topi is quite famous in all over Pakistan. == References == Category:Sindh Category:Pakistani clothing Category:Hats
title: Sindhi topi
